name: DailyPositiveNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Good news itself is not in short supply; the broadcasting of it is. This Flash Briefing skill aims to spread good vibes by bringing you positive good news stories from around the globe. 


News articles are taken from Good News Network (https://www.goodnewsnetwork.org) RSS feed.
Skill Logo by: Good Ware (https://www.flaticon.com/authors/good-ware)
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
